condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Environmental Management Framework (Schedule 2, Section I, D.2.a.) | Description :(f) FONDECYT shall carry outthe project in accordance with the environmental management framework (EMF) | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Hire key staff in the PIT (Schedule 2, Section I, A.2.b) | Description :(b) FONDECYT assigned (adscrito) toCONCYTEC, with administrative and fiduciary support from CONCYTEC, shall hire one month after effectiveness the key staff in thePIT, as detailed in the operational manual | Due Date :28-Apr-2017

Finance Agreement :Matching Grant Agreements Schedule 1, Section 1.B.1) | Description :(d) FONDECYT shall carry out the selectionand supervision of the initiatives financed through Matching Grants and sign adequate Matching Grant Agreements with Beneficiaries| Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Operational Manual (Schedule 2, Section I, D.1) | Description :(e) FONDECYT AND CONCYTEC shall carry out theproject in accordance with the operational manual | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Project Directive Committee (Schedule 2, Section I, A.3) | Description :(c) CONCYTEC shall maintain the ProjectDirective Committee | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: Project Implementation Team (Schedule 2, Section I, A.2.a) I Description: FONDECYT assigned (adscrito) toCONCYTEC, with administrative and fiduciary support from CONCYTEC, shall: (a) maintain, until the completion of the Project, a team(the PIT) responsible for the management, coordination, supervision, monitoring and evaluation of the Project. I Frequency:CONTINUOUS
